definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
Gwoyeu Romatzyh, a romanization system for Chinese devised by Y.R. Chao and others in 1925-26
all roads lead to Rome/use different means to obtain the same result (idiom)
pinyin: tiao2 tiao2 da4 lu4 tong1 Luo2 ma3
Shen2 sheng4 Luo2 ma3 Di4 guo2

sentences.english: He was anointed princeps ; the Roman empire is said to begin with his accession.
sentences.chinese: 他被奉为元首，罗马帝国据说就是从他即位开始。

sentences.english: The modern superficies systems stem from Roman Law.
sentences.chinese: 近现代地上权肇端于罗马法。

sentences.english: The roads and aqueducts of Rome have been the admiration of all after ages.
sentences.chinese: 古罗马的大道和高架渠在其后的年代一直受到羡慕。

sentences.english: Julie prefers the gothic architectural style while I like romanesque .
sentences.chinese: 朱莉偏爱哥特式建筑风格，而我则更喜欢罗马式的。

sentences.english: Romania and Hungary are operating under I.M.F.
sentences.chinese: 罗马尼亚和匈牙利正在接受国际货币基金组织的救助。

sentences.english: Tranquilli was born in Melbourne in 1966, and currently lives in Rome.
sentences.chinese: 特兰奎利出生于墨尔本在1966年，目前住在罗马。

sentences.english: "Mistakes are being made with regard to Mido, " added the representative.
sentences.chinese: 罗马俱乐部在对待米多的问题上犯了不少错误。

sentences.english: Professor: Why we think Rome was persecuting Christians?
sentences.chinese: 为什么我们会认为罗马在迫害基督徒？

sentences.english: Both factions field armies from the Roman Republic.
sentences.chinese: 两派都派出了罗马共和国军队。

sentences.english: It was the first gold won by a swimmer in a Speedo suit in Rome.
sentences.chinese: 这是身着Speedo泳衣的运动员首次在罗马夺金。

sentences.english: His name was Charlemagne-Charles Magnus, the Great-emperor of the Romans.
sentences.chinese: 他就是神圣罗马帝国皇帝查理曼大帝。

sentences.english: The Prut River forms Moldova"s entire western boundary with Romania."
sentences.chinese: 普鲁特河形成了整个西部与罗马尼亚的国界线。

sentences.english: Public celebration of the Eucharist in the Roman Catholic Church and some Protestant churches.
sentences.chinese: 十九世纪从罗马天主教分离出来的天主教派。

sentences.english: However, only one European site, the Colosseum, was picked for the new seven wonders.
sentences.chinese: 然而，新7大奇迹只有古罗马斗兽场一个是在欧洲。

sentences.english: His ashes lie in the same Roman cemetery where Keats is buried.
sentences.chinese: 他的骨灰安放在罗马公墓，济慈也安葬于此。

sentences.english: During the period of Principate, the Roman army underwent two important changes.
sentences.chinese: 进入帝国时期以后，罗马的扩张活动基本上偃旗息鼓。

definition: Napoli, capital of Campania region of Italy/Naples
Marseille, city in south France/Basay, one of the indigenous peoples of Taiwan
